greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = total number of nodes in the finite subtrees branching "left" (to the "smaller side") from the node n in the infinite trunk of "number-of-runs beanstalk" (A255056).
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..8590
example: See example in A255330. Here we count only the nodes at the left side, thus a(11) = 1.
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Feb 21 2015
